name: Wonderboy III: the dragon's trap, Gameboy demake (WIP)
name_original: Wonderboy III: the dragon's trap, Gameboy demake (WIP)
description:
This game is part of the "Port a game to the Gameboy" Game jam.

Using GB Studio V3 Alpha.

The game is still very WIP.

Goals:

Try to make the game playable up to the Meka Dragon.

Keep the graphics as close to the master system version as i can. (might change after the game jam)

See if can add sound/music.
